mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writer, views, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdDate FROM board ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT id, title, writer, content, views, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdDate, password FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, writer, content, password, contact, category) VALUES (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{password}, #{contact}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
